question: Can you help me plan a sustainable garden layout for my backyard?
true_answer: A sustainable garden layout includes native plants, rainwater collection, composting areas, and a pollinator section.

steps.description: Design garden layout with native plants

plan.current_objective: Plan a sustainable garden layout for backyard

memory_state.shared_knowledge: Native plants recommended for region; includes rainwater collection and composting. Layout design prioritizes water efficiency and biodiversity.

steps.content: Can you help me plan a sustainable garden layout for my backyard?
Creating plan: 1) Research sustainable gardening principles. 2) Gather garden examples. 3) Design layout. 4) Generate illustrative image.
Decomposing into research, example gathering, layout design, and image generation.
Assigning sustainable gardening research to researcher agent.
Conducting search on sustainable gardening practices and principles.
Found principles include using native plants, rainwater collections, and composting.
Marking research step complete. Updating shared knowledge with principles.
Assigning example gathering to browser agent.
Searching for examples of sustainable gardens.
Gathered images and layouts of sustainable gardens focusing on biodiversity and water efficiency.
Assigning layout design to analyzer agent.
Designing garden layout incorporating native plants, rainwater collection, and composting.
Drafted layout includes sections for pollinators and efficient water use.
Layout design ready. Suggest reviewing for any additional sections like vegetable patches.
Incorporated feedback and finalizing plan with an illustrative image.
Assigning media agent to generate final illustrative layout image.
Creating illustrative image of sustainable garden layout with all components.
A sustainable garden layout includes native plants, rainwater collection, composting areas, and a pollinator section.
